name: The Blob
overview: In this Pac-Man clone, you play Blob, a small yellow spherical being who lives in a maze. Poor old Blob's home is being invaded by Wibblies who can kill him with one touch. Around his labyrinthine home, he has secreted four power-up potions which allow him to take out the wibbly ghosts for a limited time. Released in Commodore Format 1990/11 (Issue #02).
